input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Gender has a direct effect on department competitiveness and peanut allergy. Department competitiveness has a direct effect on peanut allergy. The overall probability of male gender is 53%. The probability of non-male gender and being allergic to peanuts is 26%. The probability of male gender and being allergic to peanuts is 26%. Is the chance of being allergic to peanuts larger when observing male gender?
